data.message: Hi, I opened a group and have invited friends and others from another group that I am an administrator for. I have listed it as a Secret Group and I have given the URL for ones in the other group to join. They say that "This content is currently not available" when they click on the link. I do not know how to fix this. Can you please help me. Your help center does not contain any information that I can find. I am new at this so I could be going about this the wrong way. I would appreciate your assistance. Thank You :*

replies.message: Hey Bonnie. Have you tried using these tips to add new members to your group? Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1PPlszd. Thanks! -Jordan
Yes, My problem is that some will not add. Do they have to be friends for me to add them? This could be the problem. I just need to figure this out. Thanks
Also, could you please explain to me why my post from the Secret group is showing on my News Feed?
